title: Trendteon
content: It is a web platform where Brands (company) meets influencers/Podcasters and interacts and vice-versa

title: PrecisePlatForm
content: It is a website for a Company called Precise Platform

title: PrecisePoint
content: It is a blog for posting news content depending on the niche. It can also be used to blast emails to multiple individuals.

title: PollTeon
content: It is a polling platform for any niche

title: SurveyTeon
content: It is a platform for perform research/survey on different topics
